sub_title: Communication | Marketing | Public Relation | Content Writer | Event Coordinator| Masters Student - TIAS business school and society | BA Social Dynamics Graduate
summary:
A warm welcome to my LinkedIn profile. I am a dynamic and ambitious individual with a passion for communication, marketing, and public relations. I have a strong background in content writing and event coordination, and I'm currently pursuing a Masters degree at TIAS school of business and society in Utretch Netherlands.

I recently graduated from Stellenbosch University with a Bachelor of Arts degree in Social Dynamics, with a focus on Political Science, Anthropology, and Sociology. Through my academic and professional experiences, I have developed a keen ability to think critically and creatively, and to effectively communicate ideas and information to diverse audiences.

As a skilled communicator and marketer, I have a proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing and communication campaigns, managing social media accounts, and writing compelling content for various platforms. In addition, my experience in event coordination has honed my organizational and project management skills, allowing me to deliver high-quality events that meet client objectives.

I am passionate about using my skills to make a positive impact on society and am always looking for new opportunities to learn, grow, and contribute. Please don't hesitate to connect with me if you share these values and are interested in discussing potential collaborations or opportunities.

school.name: TIAS School for Business and Society

profile_positions.description:
As an events coordinator for Amnesty International at Stellenbosch University, I had the privilege of using my organizational and project management skills to help promote human rights and social justice causes. In this role, I was responsible for planning, promoting, and executing a wide range of events, including workshops, rallies, and fundraising events.

I collaborated closely with other members of the organization and external stakeholders to ensure the success of each event. This involved coordinating logistics, managing budgets, securing venues and vendors, and developing promotional materials. I also ensured that each event was aligned with the organization's mission and values, and that they effectively engaged and educated attendees on the issues at hand.

Through my work with Amnesty International, I gained valuable experience in event coordination, project management, and stakeholder engagement. I developed strong communication, negotiation, and problem-solving skills, which were essential in ensuring the success of each event. Additionally, I gained a deeper understanding of the importance of advocating for human rights and social justice issues, and the impact that community engagement and activism can have on society.

I am proud to have been a part of the Amnesty International team and remain committed to using my skills and experiences to make a positive impact in society.
profile_positions.title: Event Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
As a Social Media Marketing Organizer for the South African Student Congress (SASCO) at Stellenbosch University, my role  involved managing and coordinating the organisation's social media presence and marketing efforts. My primary objective were to effectively promote SASCO's activities, events, and initiatives to the student body and the wider community using various social media platforms.
My responsibilities included:

Social Media Strategy
Content Creation
Social Media Management
Campaigns and Promotions
Analytics and Reporting
Collaboration and Networking
Trend Monitoring and Research
Online Reputation Management
profile_positions.title: Social Media Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
As a call center apprenticeship learner for PMI Consultant, I had the opportunity to develop my customer service skills while gaining valuable experience in the business process outsourcing industry. In this role, I was responsible for providing excellent customer service to clients and managing their inquiries and complaints through various channels such as phone, email and chat.

I received comprehensive training in customer service, communication, and call center operations, which allowed me to become proficient in managing customer expectations, handling difficult situations, and providing timely and effective resolutions to customer issues. I also learned how to use various call center software applications and tools to ensure efficient service delivery and maintain accurate customer records.

Throughout my apprenticeship, I worked closely with my colleagues and superiors, receiving regular feedback and guidance to improve my performance and achieve my goals. This provided me with valuable exposure to the dynamics of working in a team, meeting targets, and contributing to the overall success of the company.

Through my experience as a call center apprenticeship learner for PMI Consultant, I gained practical skills and knowledge in customer service, communication, and call center operations. I also developed a strong work ethic, attention to detail, and the ability to work effectively under pressure. These skills have been invaluable in my career journey, and I am grateful for the opportunity to have gained them through this experience.
profile_positions.title: Communication Consultant
